h1. Heading 1

h2. Heading 2

h3. Heading 3

h4. Heading 4

h5. Heading 5

h6. Heading 6

----

Normal paragraph with *bold text*, _italic text_, and *_bold italic_*.

Also *bold*, _italic_, and -strikethrough-.

Inline {{code snippet}} here.

bq. This is a blockquote.

bq. Nested > blockquote flattened.

* Unordered item 1
* Unordered item 2
** Nested item 2a
** Nested item 2b
*** Deep nested 2b-i
* Unordered item 3

# Ordered item 1
# Ordered item 2
## Nested ordered 2a
## Nested ordered 2b
# Ordered item 3

* ( ) Unchecked task
* (/) Checked task

Mixed nested:

* Bullet item
*# Numbered sub-item
*# Another numbered

{code:language=python}
def hello(name):
    print(f"Hello, {name}!")
{code}

{code}
plain code block
no language
{code}

!https://example.com/image.png!

||Header A||Header B||Header C||
|Cell 1|Cell 2|Cell 3|
|Cell 4|Cell 5|Cell 6|
